code: import React,{useContext,useEffect,useState}from"react";import{CartContext}from"./CartContext";import'../css/Home.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Home(){const[products,setProducts]=useState([]);const{addToCart}=useContext(CartContext);useEffect(()=>{const fetchProducts=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch('https://fakestoreapi.com/products');const data=await response.json();setProducts(data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching products: ',error);}};fetchProducts();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Fake Store"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Products"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-container",children:products.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:product.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.image,alt:product.title,style:{width:'100px',height:'100px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:product.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["$",product.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["rating: ",product.rating.rate]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["count: ",product.rating.count]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>addToCart(product),children:"Add to Cart"})]},product.id))})]});}export default Home;
